Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 11th overall pick, by Houston in 2019...
Traded from Houston to Cincinnati on 3/2/2019 (Going to HOU: SS Brian Alberto. Going to CIN: 3B Justin Tepper)...
Traded from Cincinnati to Houston on 3/2/2020 (Going to CIN: RF Alonzo Alonso. Going to HOU: 3B Justin Tepper, CF Lawrence Sauter, P Ronald Diep, P Rueben Goodin)...
Injured on 8/8/2021 with a Strained Groin Muscle, out for one week...
Injured on 8/15/2022 with a Bruised Hand, out for 3 days...
Had first career hit (homerun) on 8/25/2022, off William Mettler (SEA)...
Traded from Houston to Cincinnati on 7/25/2023 (Going to HOU: CF David Martin, P George Telles, 3B Seve Guadalupe. Going to CIN: P Dwight Harwell, 3B Justin Tepper, P James Albers)...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/11/2024, hitting .458 with 2 HR, 9 RBI...
Drove in 6 runs against Boston on 5/9/2025...
Won Gold Glove at Third Base in 2025...
Won Batter of the Month award on 8/1/2026, hitting .337 with 7 HR, 23 RBI...
1/31/2027: Gets a new one-year contract worth $2,342,857 through salary arbitration...
